DOC.detailed_description: Subjects comprehensive eye examination express interest study . This include slit lamp examination front eye dilate fundoscopic examination back eye . If pathology note would exclude subject study , inform patient make appropriate referral . subject deem appropriate study comprehensive examination include computerized videokeratography , enrol . Subjects undergo bilateral simultaneous eye surgery . Which eye treat WFG-LASIK eye treat SMILE randomize 50 % chance either eye receive one treatment . Subjects see day surgery , post op day one , one week , one month , three month , six month one year . Subjects receive topical antibiotic eye one week follow procedure . Subjects receive topical steroid ophthalmic drop one week treatment . Subjects also receive topical antibiotic ophthalmic drop four day treatment . All within usual customary standard care treatment subject undergo LASIK SMILE surgery .
